Entry.JapaneseText: ……前に来た時には、 こんなものはなかった……
一度行った場所でも、 何か見つかる場合が あるという事か……
ラッキー!! 前に来た時には 何もなかったのに！
一度行ったところでも、 調べに行ったら、 新しい発見があるかもネ！
うむ……以前、ここには 何もなかったと思うが……
一度行った場所でも、 新しい発見があるかもしれんな。
まさか、こんなところに…… とても意外な感じね。
一度行った場所でも、こうやって 調べたら何かみつかるかも……？
おう、こんなとこに発見が！ おどろき桃の木だぜ！
前に行った場所でも、 もういっぺん行ってみたら、 何か見つかるかもしれないな！
こんなところに…… そう、こんな事もあるのね。
行った事がある場所でも、 もう一度調べたら、何か見つかる かもしれないって事ね……
初めてのアイテム会話
初めてのアイテム会話
初めてのアイテム会話
<voice:41000001>ああ…… ここにゲオルギアスの身体が 眠っているんだな。
<voice:41000002>まったく役立たずどもめ…… 時間稼ぎすらできないとは。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000002>What a disappointment! To think that those imbeciles couldn't even do something as simple as stall for time!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000003>ジルバ!? なぜおまえがここに!?
<voice:41000004>……おまえたちには 聖獣王の力は渡さぬ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000004>I will not hand over the power of the King of the Sacred Beasts to the likes of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000006>聖獣王の力を手に入れ、 世界を救うのはこの私だ。 だが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000006>I shall be the sole inheritor of Geyorkias's power, so that I can bring about the salvation of this world. Though...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000007>その世界に、 ヒューマはいない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000007>...The world that I save shall be void of Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000008>この地上から、愚かで醜い ヒューマという不純物を取り除き、 ガジュマだけの国を作るのだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000008>Huma are a foolish, unsightly blight that I will purge from this land. In doing so, I shall build a nation solely for Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000a>選ばれし民、ガジュマの国…… ガジュマだけが生きる理想の国…… カレギア……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000A>A Kingdom for the chosen... And ideal nation where only Gajuma live... Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000b>その理想の国を、 この私が導くのさ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000B>And I will be the one to pave the way toward this ideal country!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000c>何が理想の国だ!! ふざけんじゃねえ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000C>There's nothing ideal about that at all! You've lost your damn mind!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000d>おまえたちが何と言おうと、 それが聖獣王の意思……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000D>You can say what you like, but that is the will of the King of the Sacred Beasts himself...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000e>私は、聖獣王に 選ばれし者なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000E>For I have been chosen by him!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000011>バースのラドラス陛下に 対する謀り事は……ジルバ、 すべておまえの仕業だったのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000011>Barrs's plot against King Ladras... Zilva, was that all your doing?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000012>フフフ…… もはや隠す必要もあるまい。 おまえの想像どおりさ、<Eugene>。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000012>Hehehe... There's no point in hiding it now. It is just as you suspect, <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000013>ドクター・バースの身体と入れ替わり、 ラドラスに毒を盛ったのも、 おまえを殺そうとしたのもこの私……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000013>I switched bodies with Doctor Barrs and used him to poison Ladras, and to make an attempt on your life as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000014>入れ替わりだと!? まさか、おまえも <Yellow>月のフォルス<White>を……!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000014>You switched bodies?! Then that means you also have the <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000016>だが、逆に刺されてしまうとは 思わなかったがな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000016>I will admit that I didn't expect to get stabbed in return...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000017>……まあ、結果的に邪魔者が 排除できた事には変わらない……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000017>...But no matter, I was still able to rid myself of the biggest obstacle to my plans...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000018>……あなたが…… あなたがお父さんを……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000018>So it was you... You're the one who got my father killed...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000019>ハハハハ……感じるだろう？ 聖獣王は間もなく復活する。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000019>Hahaha... You can feel it, can you not?! Soon the King of the Sacred Beasts shall return to this world...
<voice:4100001A>...And bring about the annihilation of all Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001b>アガーテを使っての復活は失敗したが、 今度は、今度こそは…… ハハハハ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001B>Using Agarte for that end resulted in a failure, but not this time. Why, this time... Ahahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001c>陛下をたぶらかしたのもおまえか！ おのれジルバ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001C>Then it was you who manipulated Her Majesty into performing that ritual! Zilva, you wretched...!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001d>ハハハハ、今頃わかったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001D>Ahahaha! You're just now figuring this out?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001e>おまえさえいなくなってしまえば、 世間知らずの小娘を操るなど、 他愛もなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001E>It was absurdly easy to manipulate such a naive girl with you no longer in the picture!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001f>ヒューマの身体が欲しければ ゲオルギアスを甦らせろ、ひいては それが国のためだとささやくだけで、 すべてが面白いように転がった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001F>I just had to convince her that by resurrecting Geyorkias she could get the body of a Huma, all the while saving the Kingdom... And then things got interesting!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000020>ジルバ……貴様…… アガーテの気持ちを利用して……！ そのせいでクレアも……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000020>Zilva, you monster! Taking advantage of Agarte's feelings... Dragging Claire into this mess...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000021>おまえのような奴に、 ゲオルギアスの力は渡さない!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000021>I'll never let Geyorkias's power fall into the hands of someone like you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000022>ハハハハ…… おまえたちの死をもって、 新しい世界の幕開けとしよう じゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000022>Hahaha! Then your deaths shall mark the beginning of my new world!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000024>シャクだね……シャクだよ!! この私が……私の夢を…… メチャクチャにしやがってぇぇぇッ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000024>Now you've really pissed me off!! My dream... You've gone and ruined my dream!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000025>やはりあの時、おまえを 殺しておくべきだった…… <Eugene>……<Eugene>…… <Eugene>・ガラルドォォォォッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000025>I knew I should have finished you off when I still had the chance, <Eugene>... <Eugene>... <Eugene> Gallardo!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000026>だが……だが、おまえたちも終わりだ!! アハハハハハ…… どうせ、ヒューマは滅ぼされるのだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000026>Make no mistake, however... This is it for you as well! Ahahaha! Huma shall be eradicated regardless...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000027>おまえたちがよみがえらせる 聖獣王によってな……フフフ…… キャハハハハハハ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000027>...At the hands of the King of the Sacred Beasts that you have come to resurrect! Hehehe... Gyahahahaha!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000028>ゲオルギアスは…… オレたちが説得してみせる！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000028>After we revive him... We're going to convince him otherwise!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000029>説得だと……ハハハ…… 無駄な事を……フフフフ…… せいぜい悪あがきするがいいさ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000029>Convince him? Hahaha...! A futile endeavor... Ahaha...! Well, go ahead and try, if you dare!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100002b>私の首をとりたいか？ ヒヒヒヒヒ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100002B>Do you want to finish me off? Ahaha!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100002d>親子愛…… 泣かすじゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100002D>Ah, the love a child has for their parents! It's enough to bring a tear to one's eye...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000031>まだ終わっちゃいない!! 早くゲオルギアスを 復活させるんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000031>This isn't over yet, guys! Hurry and revive Geyorkias!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000032>みんな、やるぞ！ オレたちの想いのすべてを ゲオルギアスに伝えるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000032>Let's do this! We need to convey our heartsー our idealsー to Geyorkias!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000033>聖獣王ゲオルギアス…… オレたちに力を貸してくれ！ この災いを止めるために……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000033>Geyorkias, King of the Sacred Beasts... Lend us your power! Help us avert this catastrophe!
<voice:41000035>Too late? What are you talking about?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000036>大空に邪なる心が満ちる時、 災いの獣、降り立ち、 大地に破滅をもたらす……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000036>When the hearts of the wicked fill the skies, the Beast of Calamity shall descent from above and lay waste to the earth...
<voice:41000037>...And it shall bear the name Yuris.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000039>汝らが我を倒した時に飛び散った 思念は、我のものではない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000039>The <Blue>Will<White> that scattered about after you defeated me was not my own.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100003c>長年、我がユリスを抑えつけてきた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100003C>For many years, I had been able to contain it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100003d>あの時、ユリスの思念は 我が縛めを逃れ、 世界中に飛び散った。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100003D>But upon my defeat, Yuris's <Blue>Will<White> had escaped from me, and spread throughout the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100003e>思念は<Yellow>ヒト<White>の持つ 憎しみやねたみといった感情を 増長させた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100003E>Its <Blue>Will<White> intensified the feeling of hatred and envy that people held.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100003f>思念は汝らによって浄化されたが、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の持つ負の感情は残った。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100003F>And though you had freed them from that <Blue>Will<White>, the negative emotions held by <Yellow>Mankind<White> lingered on.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000040>そして、その感情が ユリスを生む……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000040>And from those emotions, Yuris has been given life.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000042>我が名をかたり、ジルバを操り、 世界を混乱に導きし……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000042>That which assumed my identity... That which manipulated Zilva and led the world into chaos...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000043>そして、今、自ら形をなすは 世界を殺す剣、万物の敵……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000043>And that which now takes the form of a sword that shall kill the world, the enemy of creation itself...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000047>なんて事……!! ゲオルギアスですら 歯が立たないなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000047>I can't believe it... Even Geyorkias is powerless against it!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000048>ヒトの負の感情が生み出した…… あれがユリスの力なのか……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000048>The darkness that lurks within the hearts of <Yellow>Man<White>... Is that really the source of Yuris's power?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000049>終わりだ…… 世界は破滅する……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000049>This is indeed the end. The world shall come to ruin...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100004a>ユリスを倒す方法は ないんですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100004A>Is there truly no way to defeat it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100004b>ユリスを生んだ <Yellow>ヒト<White>の負の感情は強大すぎる…… もはや……希望はない……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100004B>The negative emotions that begat Yuris have grown too strong. We are without hope...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100004c>まだだ…… まだオレたちはやれる……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100004C>No! There must be something we can do about this!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100004d>ああ、黙って死ぬなんて まっぴらだぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100004D>Yeah, I'm not going down without a fight!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000057>本当に…… もう何もできないの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000057>Is there really... nothing we can do?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000058>このままユリスに 滅ぼされちゃうなんて イヤだよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000058>Yuris is going to kill us all... This can't be happening!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100005b>ユリスの領域ができたのだ…… やがてそれは世界を呑み込み、 全てを消し去る……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100005B>Yuris's realm has begun to take form... Soon it shall devour this world and eradicate everything in its wake.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100005d>こうなる前に……<Yellow>ヒト<White>を 滅ぼしておくべきだった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100005D>I should have... eradicated <Yellow>Mankind<White> before any of this had come to pass...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000060>無駄だ……我に倒せぬものを…… <Yellow>ヒト<White>の力で何ができる……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000060>That is a fruitless endeavor. If I am not capable of stopping it... Then how could the power of <Yellow>Mankind<White> ever hope to?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000061>うるせぇ!! あきらめたら、 そこで終わりだろうが!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000061>Oh, just shut up! If we give up now, then that's it!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000062>……なぜだ…… なぜ汝らは戦おうとする…… 恐れはないのか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000062>Why... Why do you still fight... Are you not afraid?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000063>怖いです…… でも信じあえる仲間がいるから、 どんな事にも立ち向かえるんです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000063>We are... But because we believe in each other, we can stand against anything that comes our way.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000064>ねえ、ゲオルギアス、 ボクたちが負けたら、 後はよろしくネ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000064>Well, Geyorkias, if we're defeated, then the rest is up to you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000067>……ユリスの領域は広がり続け、 やがて、暗黒が世界を覆い、 破滅を迎える……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000067>Should Yuris's Realm continue to spread, the world shall be enveloped in darkness and meet its doom.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000068>……ユリスを倒さぬ限り、 世界を救う事はできぬ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000068>Only through defeating Yuris may the world be saved.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000069>……わかった。 ゲオルギアス、見ていてくれ。 オレたちの戦いを……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000069>We know. Geyorkias... Watch over us in this battle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
